entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
